audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - History Archives Reel #1: Leo Sharfman; Charles Sink; Ralph Sawyer; Stanley Dodge ([R266B]) - 1965 August, September; 1966

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 122] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : [Segment 1] : U-M History July 15, 1966; History Archives was a series of oral history broadcasts from 1965 to 1966. Guests: I. Leo Sharfman and Charles Sink.
[Program 122] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : [Segment 2] : U-M History 7/15/1966; History Archives was a series of oral history broadcasts from 1965 to 1966; Guests: Ralph Sawyer, Physics.

[Program 122] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : [Segment 3] : U-M History 7/15/1966; History Archives was a series of oral history broadcasts from 1965 to 1966; Guests: Ralph Sawyer,Physics; Stanley Dodge; Geography.
